data.system_settings: iPhone 6s with iOS 11.0.3 & iPad Air 2 with iOS 11.1 PB 5
data.actual_result: Bot tag overlaps with other icons or will be cut/get stretched.
data.expected_result: Bot tag should be completely visible.
data.short_description: Bot icon cut off/stretched for very long nicknames
data.steps_to_repro: - Give a bot a very long nickname like `WWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW` - Observe the bot tag of this bot in the member list or/and go to the members menu in server settings (there might be other cases)
